newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: RESEARCH ALERT - Buy Elec & Eltek - Fraser.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Buy Elec & Eltek - Fraser.

text.p: Fraser-AMMB Research has called for a buy on printed circuit board (PCB) maker Elec & Eltek International Co (E&E) based on its attractive valuations.

It said E&E, a subsidiary of Hong Kong's Elec & Eltek International Holdings Ltd, is trading at an attractive 1997 price earnings (PE) ratio of 15.4 times, a five percent discount to the Singapore electronics sector PE.
Frasers has forecast a net profit of Singapore $55.9 million for E&E's financial year ending June 30, 1997, and also S$68.5 million for 1998.
"The shares look even more attractive at 12.6 times 1998 earnings," it said.
Frasers expects E&E to outperform the global PCB market, which is projected to grow seven to eight percent annually over the next few years.
It expects E&E to turn in a compounded annual growth rate of around 18 percent in turnover and earnings per share over the next three years.
Frasers also said E&E's strategy to concentrate production in cost countries like China will give it a competitive edge.
E&E shares were trading at US$5.70, down five cents on Thursday morning.
